entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 03:54 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -35.0°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
